name: coPong
description:
In the process of learning how to code games from scratch with very minimal coding experience, one must start small.

And so CS50's free "Introduction to Game Development" course naturally starts small: with recreating Pong.

But why stop there? Why just remake Pong?  Why not make it worse?  Why not make it co-operative.

Fun on your own, with a friend, or with up to four people if you can find some way to co-ordinate that!

WOW! coPONG!
